website_summaries.verdict: This adorable piggy bank sings to your baby, as well as teaches her numbers and animals in English and Spanish.
pros: Comes with 10 coins to teach animals, numbers, and motor skills
Designed for ages 6 months to 3 years
Smart Stages technology gives different developmental learning content
Features more than 40 songs, tunes and phrases

customer_reviews.title: Cute but Missing the Music Setting
customer_reviews.text: This is just as cute as the older one. It is actually plumper and rounder. Maybe it's even cuter. I don't like that it doesn't have the music setting anymore. There is a setting where it counts and another where it counts but in both English and Spanish. There is no setting where it just does music and sounds the way the older one did. I think that was better for very young babies. I have no complaints about how the toy works, though.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Oink, Oink
customer_reviews.text: Such a simple toy - bought this for our granddaughter when she was about 6 months old. She is going on to two - and still loves it. She is over at our house about once a week. This toy is still one that she seeks to play with - The coins she has teethed on, stacked, and enjoys dropping them through the pig's slot. She loves to hug and kiss the pig, and press his nose to hear him sing the different couple songs - which she dances to. This toy is quality made.
customer_reviews.author: Ardie O.

customer_reviews.title: Toddler Approved! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 17 month old. Right away he loved it and weeks later still does. Very cute. Has several cute songs and phrases. Has a level 1 and level 2 switch that counts in English and Spanish. Both levels are enjoyable. My son loves to push its nose and hear it sing! He also loves to put the coins in the slot and stays entertained for at least 30 minutes if not an hour. A great enducational toy for my little one!
customer_reviews.author: Bria

customer_reviews.title: Piggy
customer_reviews.text: I came across this when looking for an early Valentine's present for my granddaughter who was born the end of November. She immediately caught on to putting the coins into the pig. Unlike many toys, it is easy for her to use all the features. She quickly caught on to how to open the pig, retrieve the coins, and close it back up as well as touch its nose for a song or a few words. I don't know how long it will appeal to her, but she enjoyed it the two and half days I visited and I was pleased with the purchase. Good value as well.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa F. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute Toy
customer_reviews.text: My one year old daughter loves this toy! It comes with ten huge coins. The pig counts the coins as they are put in through the slot. My daughter can’t quite line up the coins by herself yet, but she enjoys pushing them through once we’ve helped get them in the right spot. Then she enjoys opening up the bank and pulling the coins out. When its nose is pushed, the pig oinks and sings cute songs about money and counting and colors. This toy seems very sturdy, and I would definitely recommend it. We love it so much that we ordered another one to give as a gift to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: K.

customer_reviews.title: Kids ages 2-3 love this pig
customer_reviews.text: Kids ages 2-3 love this pig. It will keep them entertained for hours. It's one of the best toys for tots. I know this because I'm a speech pathologist and I know what toys kids like. My complaint is that the previous make was hardier and this model is cheaper. It's smaller and flimsier. I'm disappointed they made this amazing toy more cheaply made. Boo Fisherprice.
customer_reviews.author: NatashaNJohns

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this toy since our daughters therapists use these with her. She loves them and it’s the first toy she’s ever actually played with. She has been working on fine motor skills and just using toys in general. She loves pressing the nose and sticking the coins inside. The door is also easy enough for her to get open which I’m sure she appreciates. Great toy!
customer_reviews.author: Fewell Fam

customer_reviews.title: 1-year-old figured it out quickly
customer_reviews.text: My 1-year-old son loves this toy. It took him a few days to figure it out and all he wanted to do was open and close the door over and over. But once he mastered putting the coins in the slot, this became one of his favorite toys. He loves to push the piggy's nose and giggles when he says "oink".
customer_reviews.author: CaitM

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for a 14 month old!
customer_reviews.text: My 14 month old LOVES this toy!! She will play with it every day! At first she didn’t know how to put the coins through the top slot but after a day or so she was a pro! She likes to open and close the door on the side of the pig and take the coins in and out. She even tries to put other small toys inside the pig lol. The piggy voice and songs are cute too. Such a great little toy!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: My “go to” gift for first birthdays!
customer_reviews.text: My oldest child is now 6. He had the older version of this as a baby. We still Use it for my 2 year old. It has been one of our FAVORITE toys through the baby/toddler years. It’s my “Go-to” first birthday gift. We recently bought this for my niece and she also absolutely loves it! Good fine motor practice, Colors, counting, fun songs. We love this toy!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Entertaining Toy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our daughter's first birthday. The quality is great. She loves opening and closing the door on the front. For some reason five of 10 coins are slightly smaller in size. Not sure why? It doesn't affect play or anything. I just thought it strange. Also, as you put the coins in the slot on top, the piggy counts them. However, if you pause too long between coins, the counting starts over. Not a big deal if you are fast enough, but toddlers who are still learning fine motor skills might not put the coins in fast enough.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Go to 1 year old birthday gift for friends
customer_reviews.text: My 14mo loves this toy. I thought it was a little gauche - a big plastic talking pig, but she really has fun opening the side, putting the coins in the top, and mashing the nose to make it talk. It's now my go-to one year old birthday gift for friends because they have all loved it. Also, everyone seems to be gifting Melissa & Doug toys so I feel safe that it won't be a duplicate gift.
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old daughter loves this. It’s small enough that she can carry it around everywhere. The coins are also pretty big, perfect for little hands. I don’t like that the volume can’t be controlled, it sounds kind of quiet and hard to hear when counting. Not only can your little one learn to count, but also can learn colors from the coins.
customer_reviews.author: S. M. A.

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Cute
customer_reviews.text: I like this! My little one loves putting things into other things (best game ever!) so this toy hits the mark. She can also play with the large coins as she gets older using them for pretend play. The coins are very large and no choking hazard in case anyone is concerned. It counts in English and Spanish. She likes it! You can play with it with volume on (2 levels) or off.
customer_reviews.author: VGG

customer_reviews.title: It's a great toy for teaching counting and using fine motor skills
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 year old. It's a great toy for teaching counting and using fine motor skills. It comes with 10 plastic coins and children can put into the small hole in the top of the piggy bank. Each coin has a number on one side and a picture of a barnyard animal on the other. The pig has two levels of music. Level one is in English and level two is both English and Spanish. The only downside to this toy is that there isn't a volume button so the music is a little loud.
customer_reviews.author: G Buck

customer_reviews.title: Another great Laugh & Learn product
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute little piggy bank. We love Laugh & Learn toys from Fisher-Price because they're such good value for the money. This piggy bank is no exception. Our daughter received this at 17 months, and she adores it. She loves the different colors, the sounds the piggy makes and opening (and sometimes closing) the little door. As she grows, this will help her with her counting, as well as the idea (we hope) of saving money. This is a cute little product that I would totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pinkribbon20Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Cute Pig
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old son likes the coins. He likes biting them and carrying them around. Unfortunately, he has already lost two coins despite my trying to keep them together. After I showed him how to open the door he was excited to be able to do that. He enjoys putting the coins in the pigs belly and taking them out. He does not put the coins in the top of the bank yet. It is nice the pig can be enjoyed on different levels.
customer_reviews.author: meeshell

customer_reviews.title: especially one like this where a child would obviously put the coins ...
customer_reviews.text: Not BPA free! Why would a major toy company sell products for babies and toddlers with BPA, especially one like this where a child would obviously put the coins in his/her mouth? I got rid of this before using... it's cute but not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Citymommy123

customer_reviews.title: This little piggy went to the market
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this toy. I think my grandson loves it more, but maybe not, lol. I love that it teaches you in both English and Spanish. Anymore you about have to know Spanish as much as you know English, so you might as well start them out young. My grandson loves the songs, the noises and the fun he has with his little pig. It entertains him and his little sister for longer than 15 minutes and that in itself is a miracle.
customer_reviews.author: Keene Family

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: My toddler son seems to enjoy playing with the piggy. However the item I received only has the numbers 5 & 6 on the door instead of all 1-9 as seen on the pictures. It is clearly a bad product that I received. Unfortunately I threw away the box and did not notice it right away.
customer_reviews.author: 7 M ABS

customer_reviews.title: Cute first piggy bank
customer_reviews.text: My 7 month old son loves his piggy bank. The coins are primarily used for teething purposes because he has not quite mastered putting the coins in his bank. I am able to set a coin in the slot, which has a lever that holds the coin up. My son then proceeds to push the coin down so that it drops into the piggy bank or he grabs the coin and chews on it. I like that i can just set the coin in the slot and he can decided if he wants to 'spend' or 'save'. The pig talks when you press it's nose, open/close the door, and counts when you put a coin in the top slot.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Fisher Price laugh and learn piggy bank
customer_reviews.text: Fisher Price always makes the best toys and this is no different! From the time my granddaughter got the piggy in the mail from grandma she loved it- and in a couple of days she was already counting to 6! She is 1 1/2 years old. My daughter was so happy she said she almost cried for joy! She is normally a very active child- but was able to sit for a very long time and it held her interest She did lose a coin- which I see you can buy replacements for- but then my daughter found it under the couch. The replacement coins are expensive so I was happy when she said she found it.
customer_reviews.author: Madelaine

customer_reviews.title: We like it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to open. Pieces are nice and big, no chance of getting those in a mouth. Good buy, my boys love containers and putting stuff in them and this distracts from their actual piggy banks. We like it.
customer_reviews.author: kat4m

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty disappointed with this toy. The description says it has 40+ sing-along-songs, tunes, and phrases and maybe it does but it seems highly repetitive without many songs at all, which is what I was expecting. The voice on it is the most annoying of any of my son's toys. He seems mildly interested in it and it does include Spanish counting which is why I'm giving it more than 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: M. T.

customer_reviews.title: Great toddler toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 18 month old daughter and she loves it, she loves putting the coins out but it's a little hard for her to open the door to get them back out which is fine with me as she's less likely to lose the coins. She's been counting more since I got her this so it's really helped with that!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: VERY cute, but our volume is almost nonexistent
customer_reviews.text: It’s adorable, but our sound is so low, you can barely hear it. Not sure if the batteries are going low or if the one was defective... my daughter is one, so she doesn’t care either way. Hope they aren’t all this low of volume though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sweet toy that 15 month old grandson loves.
customer_reviews.text: 15 month old grandson loves it. It’s challenging for him to insert the plastic coins into the slot but he keeps trying and is often successful. He likes to throw things and this pig gets thrown around on wood floors and keeps on going. Very sturdy indeed!
customer_reviews.author: F.C.

customer_reviews.title: "Oink-Oink"
customer_reviews.text: Had one before and it was stolen at work. For preschool-level fine motor development, it's perfect. My kindergarten friends (special ed) love the interactive piggy voice when you press the nose. The only problem is that if there is a delay between the insertion of coins, "Piggy" seems to forget and restarts the count, which is a bummer for kids with fine motor issues who are also working on counting.
customer_reviews.author: sceneit

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves playing with this in multiple ways. Yes he enjoys putting the coins in, but has up graded play to literally throwing it like a basket ball in the tub. We of course stopped that game quick. But I can't believe it didn't crack and the sound still works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute piggy bank
customer_reviews.text: It has been a year I brought it for my son. Now he is still playing with it. It’s a great toy for toddlers to learn numbers, counting and also color. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Cute piggy bank
customer_reviews.text: Cute piggy bank! Has 2 different levels of learning. You can put coins in the slot, take them out, and press his nose for activities. Bought this for my 1 1/2 year old. She got a real glass piggy bank for Christmas and loved putting change in it, but made me super nervous due to the glass and change, so I bought her this as an alternative. Easy for her to hold, pick up, and use. Coins also are numbered and have animal pictures on them.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Fun Toy
customer_reviews.text: This is a really fun activity for 18- 24 month olds, it is easy enough that they can put them in & take them back out with no problem. My daycare kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An attention grabber! :)
customer_reviews.text: Out of all the Hanukkah gifts I gave my grandson, this piggy is the most intriguing for him. He was 16 months old when he got it and still goes to play with it. In fact my son put aside some of his other presents till he's older. Years ago, I also gave this to my grand daughter, and she loved it too. This is what prompted me to buy it for my grandson. It grabs their attention for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Learning toy for price
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter first seen this at a play group. Almost all the children were trying to play with at some point while we were there. It plays songs when it's nose is touched and says some things like a " sneeze and bless you " there are 2 settings . One for easy counting and another one that does counting in English & Spanish. They won't even realize that they are picking up 2 languages while playing Order the extra coins if you can when you purchase this. If your child is like mine she will quickly lose a few coins here or there.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Useful toy
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy this pig for the children I work with for their 1st birthday so they can grow into it. Once they are two we use to coins to practice money management and values. They earn a coin for cleaning up and can buy various activities at the end of the day or save their coins for bigger prizes.
customer_reviews.author: MOMSlist

customer_reviews.title: Great fine motor skill toy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this toy. It’s awesome at teaching fine motor skills. It comes with 10 coins of different colors. It has 2 different learning stages. The only real difference between the 2 stages is that the second stage will say the number in Spanish as well as English. The coins are fairly large in their size and requires fairly good concentration from your little one to put it in the slot. Overall I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: LAURA STEWART

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best toys! I initially recieved it for my daughter ...
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best toys! I initially recieved it for my daughter when she turned 1 years old as a birthday gift. Putting the coins in the bank really helps fine motor skills. This toy has helped her learn her colors through the coins, as well as counting by putting the coins in the bank. My daughter is 3 years old and still plays with it. I give this toy to other babies as a birthday present, because it has been such a favorite in our house.
customer_reviews.author: Amy D

customer_reviews.title: I hate that the pig talks
customer_reviews.text: I use this during speech therapy sessions with kids aged 1-3. I hate that the pig talks, I just need the pig to be quiet. The off switch should be on the bottom, all my kids immediately find the switch on the top (probably what the designers wanted...not what I want).
customer_reviews.author: Maddyb89

customer_reviews.title: Keeps him busy!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this! I love that there are two different settings. One that counts each coin as it Is put in and one that does same in English followed by Spanish. He also learns open and close when opening the pig to get the coins out (when the door is opened it says open and when closed says closed). This toy keeps him busy and learning! He is now 15 months and we have had this toy since 14 months. I like to wait a bit before leaving a review for accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great piggy bank to develop motor skills start counting and distinguishing colors
customer_reviews.text: A very cute piggy bank! Perfect for toddlers as well smaller kids :) my son is 1,5 years old and he loves this toy. It easy for him to put coins in it and to open it to play all over again ! We enjoy Fisher price products very much!
customer_reviews.author: kristina

customer_reviews.title: love it!!
customer_reviews.text: love this gift!! we received it as s gift and gave it as one because my daughter loved it so much! very durable and came with a good amount of coins to place in the piggy. she is learning her colors with the coins as well! awesome gift!
customer_reviews.author: SKM724

customer_reviews.title: Toy has multiple educational opportunities in a fun and exciting format
customer_reviews.text: The Fisher price Laugh and learn pig was suggested by my son's physical therapist, as a fun way to improve fine motor skills. The toy also helps him learn colors and counting. My son's therapist has a similar pig as this version. The size difference between them is remarkable. A previous version must exist because this pig is considerably smaller that an earlier version. My son loves this toy and I appreciate the fact that he is playing while he learns valuable life skills.
customer_reviews.author: maury

customer_reviews.title: It can be for nice for a gift for 8 months and old .
customer_reviews.text: My kid love it this toy , has music , tells numbers in Spanish and English , 2 stages for little ones and older kids too . Very cute , a door the open and closes and plays music too .
customer_reviews.author: Dania aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Really advanced her fine motor skill
customer_reviews.text: My daughter at 9 month wasn’t interested in it. because of the level of difficulty of putting the coins in the pig. Now at 12 months, it’s her favorite toy. She play with it everyday. And hide the coins around the house and I have to look for them!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old grandson loves this toy. He enjoys opening and closing the side (for removing the discs) as much as he likes putting the “coins” in the slot. Sturdy, cute toy with sounds and music.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona H.

customer_reviews.title: My Kids Still Play with this 4yrs Later
customer_reviews.text: My kids are 8 & 5 and they still play with this. It's very sturdy and they use it for all sorts of things, but mainly a cash register at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Realistic Optimistic

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Best learning toy ever!!! My 1 yr old granddaughters fav. She’s learned all her colors & counting! Loves the big colorful coins & inserts them in the piggy bank over & over & empties the side lift. Great storage, small unit! Perfect gift! Songs, ABC & Spanish feature as well 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: DARLENE

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 kids all age ranges. I can honestly say it caught the attention of all 3 kids at first. My 6 year old obviously got bored but my 1 and 3 yr old are going strong! They love putting the coins in.
customer_reviews.author: Customer412

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! You get 10 of the coins all labeled with the number of them. My daughter loves playing with this piggy bank! Easy to put the coins in and easy for her to take them out. Love also that if you choose the level two it teaches them the numbers in English and Spanish!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great learning product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for any little child. I bought this for my daughter and for my nieces and nephews when they were her age.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Great toddler toy!
customer_reviews.text: This was my son's favorite toy he received for Christmas. It really helps with his fine motor skills of placing the coins in the slot. Love that the coins are big for a toddler to hold and bright in color. The pig says the numbers when the coins drop in familiarizing kids with counting. There are also cute songs the pig makes when you press it's nose.
customer_reviews.author: L Baker

customer_reviews.title: ... toy for my granddaughter 10 years ago and she loved it. By the time my grandson came along ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toy for my granddaughter 10 years ago and she loved it. By the time my grandson came along last year, the toy was no longer playing music and we had lost all but 3 of the plastic coins. But he will sit and play with it just the same as she did 10 years ago. So I just bought him one of his own brand new for Christmas. He is going to love it!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Super amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little pig and a great price! It counts up to 10 and says the color! It has different levels for different ages! Super amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: One year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for my one year old and she adores it. She'll sit there for at least fifteen minutes putting the coins in the piggy then taking them out and doing it all over again. She also likes chewing on the coins.
customer_reviews.author: Annik Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Fun for hours
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this product and plays with it all the time. There is also a feature when you open/close the door the pig says "open" or "close" which I feel like is an extra benefit to learning.
customer_reviews.author: K_J_Stovall

customer_reviews.title: Pigtastic
customer_reviews.text: My 18mo loves this pig! He's learning to put the coins in himself and is especially delighted by opening and closing the window on the side as the pig says "open, close" while doing it. We count along with the number of coins put in, so does the pig, and talk about the coins colors. All in all a great educational/fine motor skill toy that's also cute and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Rosanne

customer_reviews.title: Fun while learning
customer_reviews.text: Love this toy! Perfect for my learning 16 month old. He totally gets a kick out of the noises and looks satisfied when his coins make it in the piggy bank.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Reding

customer_reviews.title: So fun to see our son learn with this cute toy!
customer_reviews.text: This has been such a great Christmas gift for our son! We weren't sure if he was old enough to use it (he was 16.5 months old when we bought it), but once we showed him how to use it he caught on really quickly and plays with it every day! He loves to push the nose to make the pig talk and play music, and also loves to put the coins in the bank (which also makes noise and counts the coins for you). It's so fun to see him learn, and the music and noises are cute!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff & Alisa

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest toy. It’s very attractive and easy to use. Great for learning to count and early language skills. I saw it at the library and immediately searched for it and bought it.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: and love it so much I bought it for my daughter ...
customer_reviews.text: Any toy Fisher-Price makes is pure gold. There are so many learning opportunities with this toy. I use the piggy bank in my speech therapy sessions, and love it so much I bought it for my daughter to use too (she is 1 1/2). Its great for identifying/labeling colors, turn taking, requesting, counting, concepts (put in, take out, give me, more, on top, in, out, etc). This is a must have for every parent!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A favorite gift for my grandson's first birthday.
customer_reviews.text: My neighbor recommended this toy for my grandson's first birthday. It quickly became his favorite gift. He enjoys opening and closing the door to the pig and hearing the pig talk to him. He quickly learned how to slip the coins in the slot and how to trick the pig to talk more, by holding on to the coin and raising and lowering it into the slot. Every handy that everything packs up in side the pig.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Davies

customer_reviews.title: A hit with my 18 mo
customer_reviews.text: My 18 mo likes this toy quite a bit. He loved putting the coins in, opening and closing the door, and pressing the piggie's nose. The toy has held up quite well so far - he has a tendency to throw things from his high chair - so this toy has been thrown a few times, but it is still in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Fun piggy bank toy
customer_reviews.text: Love this toy! I use it at work w my little kiddos. They love the songs and the various coins with animals and numbers on it.
customer_reviews.author: Faye

customer_reviews.title: So cute for baby!
customer_reviews.text: This toy is seriously so so cute. My son got it when he was 6 months old and he is now 8 months old. He loves the coins and banging them down into the slot. The piggy bank makes lots of fun noises too. This is definitely a toy that will be around for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: DawnL

customer_reviews.title: A favorite!
customer_reviews.text: My little one has loved this toy forever. It keeps her busy for so long, even after months of owning it, she can spend 20 minutes playing with it. Definitely a favorite to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 12mo old!
customer_reviews.text: My son (12 mo) loves this! He loves inserting the coins into the slot and will dance when it plays music. You can push his nose and the pig says different phrases. It “counts” the coins as you insert them in and there’s a setting for it to teach spanish.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Hahn

customer_reviews.title: ALL of the kids have absolutely loved the bank
customer_reviews.text: So cute! I had an older version of this bank for all 3 of my kids and just bought this newer one for my nephew. ALL of the kids have absolutely loved the bank. The coins are huge and perfect for kids who still like to chew on everything. They also work well for little hands learning to line up the coins through the slot on the top. My kids also love the songs and words they hear when they push on the red nose. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Sunndays in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: The coins have numbers on them so it would be nice if there was a mode where it said the ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish the pig helped to count more than just randomly rote counting. The coins have numbers on them so it would be nice if there was a mode where it said the number. and color perhaps. My daughter just received this for her first birthday, so I guess I have a while before worrying about all of that. Her favorite part is the squishy nose... :)
customer_reviews.author: V. M. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Cute pincer grasp toy
customer_reviews.text: Idk if I got a defective one, but the volume is very low. Other than that, super cute and great for practicing pincer grasp.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Farnham

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves playing with this. I wish there was a volume button because it’s not really loud. But she still loves it regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Connee

customer_reviews.title: Toddler loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My son first played with this piggy with his therapist from Birth to Three who works on speech with him. He loved it from the moment he saw it so I had to buy him one for himself. He loves "feeding" the piggy & hearing it count. It's cute, colorful & educational. I couldn't find it in any stores like Walmart or target so Amazon is always my go to place for everything! 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Nikki R

customer_reviews.title: Fun for my 12 month old.
customer_reviews.text: My 12 month old loves to put the money discs through the slot. It nice that it has a very wide opening to get the coins out. Its very similar to our Vtech chomp and count Dino but way better because it has better access to the coins. I have 4 kids, some would have liked this toy and some wouldn't. My baby does now because she likes toys with cause and effect.
customer_reviews.author: Hlyschae

customer_reviews.title: I am piggy piggy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES this! We use it for Occupational Therapy! She has the biggest grin when she sees it!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a one year old!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my one year old granddaughter and she loved it! Counts in English and Spanish. Helps to develop coordination and can be used to teach colors. She spent hours putting the coins in and taking them out. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: pam schubert

customer_reviews.title: Great for counting and developing fine motor skills
customer_reviews.text: We use “the pig” as part of our Home Occupational Therapy program it’s great for developing fine motor skills.
customer_reviews.author: Gabbie M.

customer_reviews.title: My son is 7 months and he’s obsessed with this ...
customer_reviews.text: My son is 7 months and he’s obsessed with this toy. He doesn’t fully understand it yet of course but he loves the songs, playing with the coins and opening and closing the bank door. My nephew who is 2.5 also loves this toy. He will play with it for up to an hour. It truly outlives most toys for this age range. Highly reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: Liz laboda

customer_reviews.title: Great for hand eye coordination
customer_reviews.text: 1 year olds love this! There are a couple music options. Coins are big and not a choking hazard. Helps with coordination. Pig's Nose can be pressed for his own song. Can also be used without sound. Pretty durable. It's been dropped a bunch and still keeps going
customer_reviews.author: Scout TV

customer_reviews.title: Run to get this piggy bank!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my 14 month old. She loves this toy and so does her 3 year old big sister! It's a great toy to teach colors, counting and helps with fine motor skills. You can press the pigs nose and it will sing a little song. When the coins are inserted, the pig counts. The side opens up, so the child can easily pull out the coins and play again. I highly recommend this toy!
customer_reviews.author: tampacollector2

customer_reviews.title: I like that she can still play with it and still ...
customer_reviews.text: Many months later and my 1.5 yr old still likes playing with it. It helps her with her hand eye coordination and keeps her distracted for a while. I like that she can still play with it and still enjoy it without having to turn it on and have the music.
customer_reviews.author: Lan

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This toy is a total game changer for me! I have a high energy 16 month old that can never sit still and this kept him engaged for well over an hour! Love this!
customer_reviews.author: anakin butler

customer_reviews.title: Great for dexterity and colors.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my 2 year old loves putting money in her real piggy bank. Well she had taken all of our change to fill her piggy bank up. This toy is perfect for her! She knows how to put the coins in and can open his belly to dump them all out, then repeat. Keeps her busy and is great for dexterity and learning colors.
customer_reviews.author: Samwise

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: Price was super reasonable, not something I saw locally so didn't have to worry about a double gifting
customer_reviews.author: Rena D.Top Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: ... a little ridiculous but my 18 month old grandson loved feeding the coins
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a little ridiculous but my 18 month old grandson loved feeding the coins, touching the nose to make it talk and open and close the side opening. Not sure it will have lasting interest but for the 3 days I was there, he loved the pig!
customer_reviews.author: A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for one year old
customer_reviews.text: I have gifted this little guy to so many of my friends’ children! My son loved his so much it became my go-to gift for one year birthdays.
customer_reviews.author: clabrecque430

customer_reviews.title: ) Endless amounts of fun to be had
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES this bank! It sings/talks when you open/close the side and also when you put the coins in the top. You can push the nose for a song too :) Endless amounts of fun to be had. She sits in the floor for around 30 min with this thing...Had it for a few weeks and it's a main go to toy for her :)
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: love great for lots of ages
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I originally bought this as a gift but my two boys fell in love with it too. I have a 15 month old and a 3 and s half year old. My baby just loves putting the coins in and h hearing the piggy make more noise, my older one is really into cotton counting so he lie like that. Super cute and will last forever
customer_reviews.author: Mamabearlove

customer_reviews.title: 11 month old loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy! My 11 month old loves putting the coins in the bank and opening it up and taking them out. The pig also plays some catchy tunes when you press his nose that my little one likes to bop up and down to. Very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Grosse Pointe MomTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Clunky Toy
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves the pig and putting coins into the back BUT it is very clunky and difficult for her to hold and walk with.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Transki

customer_reviews.title: Toddler tested and mom approved!
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old just loves this toy! She sits there and plays with it for a long time! Any mom or dad knows that if you can keep a toddler occupied, you have a winner!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie S.

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for 1-yr-old
customer_reviews.text: I gave this toy to my son for his first bday. It's perfect because it helps with their coordination and figuring out they have to turn the coin to put in the slot (early developmental exercise). He also loves to open and close the door to take out the coins.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Gitau

customer_reviews.title: Good to learn
customer_reviews.text: Such a great toy for a toddler/infant. My 13 month old loves it. Quality is superb and I am glad he is learning with it
customer_reviews.author: Vinita

customer_reviews.title: Great and long lasting toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my almost one year old and she loved it! It helped build her concentration and fine motor skills. She is now 20 months old and she still plays with this toy all the time. She loves the music and silly things it says when you push his nose.
customer_reviews.author: Momto2

customer_reviews.title: Great design and sound options
customer_reviews.text: Great design and sound options. For some reason all three of my kids have enjoyed discs likes these more than the common shapes (like squares, triangles, etc). I think it's easier to start with and the container compartment is great. Bought for my 1-yr-old twins, but we'll be keeping this one for a while!
customer_reviews.author: Dragonfly

customer_reviews.title: My piggy hates batteries.
customer_reviews.text: I'm really disappointed with this little pig. I've had it just over a month, and in that time I've had to replace the batteries four times after less than 10 minutes of play. I've always used brand new batteries from Kirkland or Duracell, but this pig just kills them. It's a cute pink pig and my 1 year old enjoyed it when it worked, but the 'fun' of it counting or pushing the nose for sound is gone. Unfortunately, I was 3 days late getting on here to return it - otherwise it would have been sent back.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: My twin one-year-olds love this piggy
customer_reviews.text: My twin one-year-olds love this piggy! I like that the vocalizations are so clear that the boys actually understand them and repeat the words. If they keep playing with it, they might actually learn to count in Spanish.
customer_reviews.author: Nom de Plum

customer_reviews.title: It has a great variety of sounds included some counting in Spanish
customer_reviews.text: My son (18 months) loves this product. It has a great variety of sounds included some counting in Spanish. Great toy to work on fine motor skills with opening and shutting the door and putting the coins in the slot. You also get a large number of coins too which is great cause you know you'll always lose a few under the couch somewhere. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Greenleaf

customer_reviews.title: Hidden Gem
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best Fisher-Price toys out there and I'm shocked I haven't seen it in all the stores that carry Fisher-Price toys. This toy is so simple but so much fun for my kids. I bought it for my 1 1/2 year old daughter but my 3 year old son and my 6 year old daughter are constantly playing with it too!
customer_reviews.author: Margente

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it . What else do you need to know?  :)
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son when he was 1 1/2 after a friend of ours babysat for us. When we were picking him up, he could not put this thing down. So it was settled. Time to get him the toy piggy bank. Hes just over two now and still loves to play with this. Happy baby=worth the cost. On top of that, kids (esp boys) are rough on toys and this thing is still pristine.
customer_reviews.author: Sixtyeightthousandth

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love it and my baby loves it! I know mom needs to enjoy playing but this piggy bank is awesome! And just the fact that there's some spanish words added, makes it more perfect for my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: It's a great toy for a toddler to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: M. YU

product_meta.title: Fisher-Price Laugh & Learn Smart Stages Piggy Bank, Cha-ching! Get ready to cash in on playtime fun and learning!
product_meta.description:
This piggy bank introduces baby to counting, colors, Spanish and more through music, silly sounds and phrases. With 10 colorful coins to drop into the Piggy Bank’s back, and a door for put-and-take play, it’s a toy with lots of exploration. Baby can press piggy’s nose to hear musical responses and sing-along songs, too. Put coins in, take them out, press the silly piggy’s snout – baby will be giggling all the way to the bank. Count & Learn Piggy Bank includes Smart Stages technology, an exciting new way to change learning content as baby grows. Every baby develops at their own pace, and Smart Stages gives you the ability to select the stage that’s best for your child! There are a variety of developmentally appropriate songs, phrases and sounds within two levels of play—just slide the switch to choose the right one. Smart Stages Technology Level 1 – Explore – 6M+ First words and sounds spark baby’s curiosity Level 2 - Encourage – 12M+ Prompt baby through questions and simple directions

BRAND STORY
By Fisher Price
feature_bullets: Includes Smart Stages technology – learning content changes as baby grows
Two levels of play offer fresh songs, phrases & sounds for your little one’s age & stage
Includes 10 colorful coins to drop into the piggy’s back or belly – the coins teach animals on one side and numbers on the other
Open & close door for put-and-take play

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
